properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 11:33PM EST until February 15 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Kentucky River at Lockport Lock
Rolling Fork River near Boston

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Carroll...Hardin...
Henry...Nelson...Owen.

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Kentucky...

Ohio River at McAlpine Upper
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower
Ohio River at Cannelton Lock
Ohio River at Tell City
Green River at Woodbury
Green River at Rochester

affecting the following counties in Indiana...Clark...Crawford...
Floyd...Harrison...Perry and in Kentucky...Breckinridge...Butler...
Hancock...Hardin...Jefferson...Meade...Muhlenberg...Ohio...Oldham...
Warren.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Rolling Fork River near Boston.
* until Saturday afternoon.
* At 10:30 PM Friday the stage was 36.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 35.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 35.0 feet...Agricultural bottomland is covered.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 36.2
feet on Jan 25 2006.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
